title: A Society Designed to Incentivize Criminal Behavior at the Highest Level
itunes:title: A Society Designed to Incentivize Criminal Behavior at the Highest Level
description: Matt Stoller, Director of Research at the American Economic Liberties Project and author of Goliath: The 100-Year War Between Monopoly Power and Democracy, talks about the many ways in which the US economic system has become rigged to favor the richest.
content:encoded: Matt Stoller, Director of Research at the American Economic Liberties Project and author of Goliath: The 100-Year War Between Monopoly Power and Democracy, talks about the many ways in which the US economic system has become rigged to favor the richest.
